snippet: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar apologized Wednesday for threatening to punch a reporter who asked him about problems with the government’s wild horse program at a campaign event.
abstract: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar apologizes for threatening to punch reporter with The Gazette of Colorado Springs who had asked him about problems with government’s wild horse program at a campaign event.
lead_paragraph: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar apologized Wednesday for threatening to punch a reporter who asked him about problems with the government’s wild horse program at a campaign event.
